<title level="1" right="Rules">[Attack](/Rules.aspx?ID=3288)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
When a creature tries to harm another creature, it makes a [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) or uses some other attack action. Most attacks are Strikes made with a weapon, but a character might Strike with their [fist](/Weapons.aspx?ID=356), [grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376) or [shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380) with their hands, or attack with a [spell](/Rules.aspx?ID=2221).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
